verses.verse: At <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> on the <S%G3588><s%> sabbath day <S%G4521><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> corn; <S%G4702><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> were hungry, <S%G3983><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to pluck <S%G5089><s%> the ears of corn, <S%G4719><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to eat. <S%G2068><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when the <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, they said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> is not lawful <S%G1832><s%> <S%G3756><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> upon <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath day. <S%G4521><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Have ye not <S%G3756><s%> read <S%G314><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> did, <S%G4160><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was hungry, <S%G3983><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> that were with <S%G3326><s%> him; <S%G846><s%>

How <S%G4459><s%> he entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> did eat <S%G5315><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> shewbread, <S%G740><s%> <S%G4286><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lawful <S%G1832><s%> for him <S%G846><s%> to eat, <S%G5315><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> for them <S%G3588><s%> which were with <S%G3326><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> for the <S%G3588><s%> priests <S%G2409><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> have ye not <S%G3756><s%> read <S%G314><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> law, <S%G3551><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> that on the <S%G3588><s%> sabbath days <S%G4521><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> priests <S%G2409><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple <S%G2411><s%> profane <S%G953><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> blameless <S%G338><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> in this place <S%G5602><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> one greater <S%G3187><s%> than the <S%G3588><s%> temple. <S%G2411><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye had known <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> this meaneth, <S%G2076><s%> I will <S%G2309><s%> have mercy, <S%G1656><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> sacrifice, <S%G2378><s%> ye would not <S%G3756><s%> have condemned <S%G2613><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> guiltless. <S%G338><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> sabbath day. <S%G4521><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> when he was departed <S%G3327><s%> thence, <S%G1564><s%> he went <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> their <S%G846><s%> synagogue: <S%G4864><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> which had <S%G2192><s%> his hand <S%G5495><s%> withered. <S%G3584><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> they asked <S%G1905><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Is it lawful <S%G1832><s%> to heal <S%G2323><s%> on the <S%G3588><s%> sabbath days? <S%G4521><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might accuse <S%G2723><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> shall there be <S%G2071><s%> among <S%G1537><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> shall have <S%G2192><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> sheep, <S%G4263><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> it <S%G5124><s%> fall <S%G1706><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a pit <S%G999><s%> on the <S%G3588><s%> sabbath day, <S%G4521><s%> will he not <S%G3780><s%> lay hold <S%G2902><s%> on it, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lift it out? <S%G1453><s%>

How much <S%G4214><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> is a man better <S%G1308><s%> <S%G444><s%> than a sheep? <S%G4263><s%> Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> it is lawful <S%G1832><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> on the <S%G3588><s%> sabbath days. <S%G4521><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> he to the <S%G3588><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> Stretch forth <S%G1614><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> hand. And <S%G5495><s%> he <S%G2532><s%> stretched it forth; <S%G1614><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it was restored <S%G600><s%> whole, <S%G5199><s%> like as <S%G5613><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other. <S%G243><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> went out, <S%G1831><s%> and held <S%G2983><s%> a council <S%G4824><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> how <S%G3704><s%> they might destroy <S%G622><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> it, he withdrew <S%G402><s%> himself from thence: <S%G1564><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he healed <S%G2323><s%> them <S%G846><s%> all; <S%G3956><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> charged <S%G2008><s%> them <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should not <S%G3361><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> him <S%G846><s%> known: <S%G5318><s%>
That <S%G3704><s%> it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which was spoken <S%G4483><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Behold <S%G2400><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> servant, <S%G3816><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I have chosen; <S%G140><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved, <S%G27><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> my <S%G1519><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> is well pleased: <S%G2106><s%> I will put <S%G5087><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he shall show <S%G518><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%>

He shall not <S%G3756><s%> strive, <S%G2051><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> cry; <S%G2905><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> shall any man <S%G5100><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> streets. <S%G4113><s%>

A bruised <S%G4937><s%> reed <S%G2563><s%> shall he not <S%G3756><s%> break, <S%G2608><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> smoking <S%G5188><s%> flax <S%G3043><s%> shall he not <S%G3756><s%> quench, <S%G4570><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> <S%G302><s%> he send forth <S%G1544><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> victory. <S%G3534><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> shall the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> trust. <S%G1679><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> was brought <S%G4374><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> one possessed with a devil, <S%G1139><s%> blind, <S%G5185><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> dumb: <S%G2974><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he healed <S%G2323><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> dumb <S%G2974><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saw. <S%G991><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> were amazed, <S%G1839><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3385><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> of David? <S%G1138><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when the <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, they said, <S%G2036><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> fellow doth not <S%G3756><s%> cast out <S%G1544><s%> devils, <S%G1140><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> Beelzebub <S%G954><s%> the prince <S%G758><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> devils. <S%G1140><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> their <S%G846><s%> thoughts, <S%G1761><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> itself <S%G1438><s%> is brought to desolation; <S%G2049><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> itself <S%G1438><s%> shall not <S%G3756><s%> stand: <S%G2476><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> cast out <S%G1544><s%> Satan, <S%G4567><s%> he is divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> himself; <S%G1438><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall then <S%G3767><s%> his <S%G846><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> stand? <S%G2476><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> Beelzebub <S%G954><s%> cast out <S%G1544><s%> devils, <S%G1140><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G5101><s%> do your <S%G5216><s%> children <S%G5207><s%> cast them out? <S%G1544><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> they <S%G846><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> judges. <S%G2923><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> cast out <S%G1544><s%> devils <S%G1140><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> then <S%G686><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is come <S%G5348><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

Or else <S%G2228><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a strong man's <S%G2478><s%> house, <S%G3614><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spoil <S%G1283><s%> his <S%G846><s%> goods, <S%G4632><s%> except <S%G3362><s%> he first <S%G4412><s%> bind <S%G1210><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> strong man <S%G2478><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> he will spoil <S%G1283><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house. <S%G3614><s%>

He that is <S%G5607><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> me; <S%G1700><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he that gathereth <S%G4863><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> scattereth abroad. <S%G4650><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> All manner <S%G3956><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blasphemy <S%G988><s%> shall be forgiven <S%G863><s%> unto men: <S%G444><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> blasphemy <S%G988><s%> against the <S%G3588><s%> Holy Ghost <S%G4151><s%> shall not <S%G3756><s%> be forgiven <S%G863><s%> unto men. <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> speaketh <S%G2036><s%> a word <S%G3056><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> it shall be forgiven <S%G863><s%> him: <S%G846><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> speaketh <S%G2036><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> it shall not <S%G3756><s%> be forgiven <S%G863><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world to come. <S%G3195><s%>

Either <S%G2228><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> good, <S%G2570><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> good; <S%G2570><s%> or else <S%G2228><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> corrupt, <S%G4550><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> corrupt: <S%G4550><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> is known <S%G1097><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> his fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

O generation <S%G1081><s%> of vipers, <S%G2191><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> ye, being <S%G5607><s%> evil, <S%G4190><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> good things? <S%G18><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> abundance <S%G4051><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> speaketh. <S%G2980><s%>

A good <S%G18><s%> man <S%G444><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> good <S%G18><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> bringeth forth <S%G1544><s%> good things: <S%G18><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> an evil <S%G4190><s%> man <S%G444><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> bringeth forth <S%G1544><s%> evil things. <S%G4190><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> idle <S%G692><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> men <S%G444><s%> shall speak, <S%G2980><s%> they shall give <S%G591><s%> account <S%G3056><s%> thereof <S%G4012><s%> <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment. <S%G2920><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> thou shalt be justified, <S%G1344><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> thou shalt be condemned. <S%G2613><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%> we would <S%G2309><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> a sign <S%G4592><s%> from <S%G575><s%> thee. <S%G4675><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> An evil <S%G4190><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> adulterous <S%G3428><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> seeketh after <S%G1934><s%> a sign; <S%G4592><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there shall no <S%G3756><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> be given <S%G1325><s%> to it, <S%G846><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> prophet <S%G4396><s%> Jonah: <S%G2495><s%>
